description:
"That was fun!" Isaac said after he'd finished massaging Marc and sucking the cum out of him.
Isaac said he'd always wanted to massage a bodybuilder.
"I couldn't believe how big his muscles felt in my hands!" he said. "Sometimes they were hard to get my hands around."
Of course, Isaac's favorite part was sucking Marc's big cock. He's a big boy with a cock to match.
"It was big," Issac said with a smile. "That was fun!"
title: Marc & Isaac
